trainLog.Description: logbook filled in by the participants after each training session

train_num.Description: The number of this practice session

duration_finger.Description: reported practice time for the finger tapping task

duration_foot.Description: reported practice time for the foot stepping task

assess_finger.Description: 'On a scale from 1 to 10, how would rate your performance today?' for the finger tapping task
assess_finger.Range: 1 (can't perform the sequence at all) to 10 (automaticity is reached)

assess_foot.Description: 'On a scale from 1 to 10, how would rate your performance today?' for the foot stepping task
assess_foot.Range: 1 (can't perform the sequence at all) to 10 (automaticity is reached)

notes.Description: additional comments/observations/notes, reported by the participant
